oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Underwood. Harvey Underwood Postmaster appointment.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Post Office Department
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Postmaster appointment, Harvey Underwood, Kodak Post Office, Sevier County, Tenn. May 11, 1892. Signed by Jno (John) Wanamaker, Postmaster General of the United States of America. Seal at lower left. 22 x 17” 1 pc.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Postmasters; Post offices; Apportionment; Certificates;
